plot: 100 years in the future, in a tiny town on the Yukon / Alaska border, a battle takes place that changes war forever, by changing minds.
title: Battle at Beaver Creek
plot_es: 100 years in the future, in a tiny town on the Yukon / Alaska border, a battle takes place that changes war forever, by changing minds.
plot_en: 100 years in the future, in a tiny town on the Yukon / Alaska border, a battle takes place that changes war forever, by changing minds.
